channel.title: Need help with
channel.description:
grandexchange.java when i compile it says:
GrandExchange.java:54: cannot find symbol symbol : method hasEnoughMoney(int) location: class client if (c.hasEnoughMoney(itemPrice)) ^ GrandExchange.java:70: cannot find symbol symbol : method sM(java.lang.String) location: class client c.sM("Not enough money!"); ^
2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
how do i fix this

item.title: Need help with
item.dc:creator: @wilsonman60 wilsonman60
item.description:
@wilsonman60 wrote:

Thanks THIS THRED IS CLOSED!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

I think it’s because you’re not a delta base. Change the c.sM to SendMessage.

Read full topic

item.description:

try sendMessage and have you set “hasEnoughMoney” to do something?
